title: Refund the RP that i bought accidentaly?
body: Hello guys i wanted to ask you if its possible to refund the rp that i bought. I bought 50 euro rp instead of 5 euro by accident and i am very screwed up please guys help me if you can i will appriciate it.

replies.body: Pretty sure we can help you out here, especially if it hasn't been used it!  Reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our Billing team will check into this for you.
Yes I havenâ€™t used the Rp I hope we can sort this out and also I send a ticket and now I am waiting for an answer thank you apriciate it!
